attributes.action: prevent the RFL from changing Super League licence criteria for Toulouse Olympique XIII
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Investigate and prevent if necessary the governing body of Rugby League from altering application criteria for clubs that they favour. The licence application process is supposed to be a fair and transparent process but so far it appears to be neither.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
